subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nashville center Scott Nichol agreed to contract terms with the Predators. Nichol signed a two-year deal that will pay him $750,000 each season, General Manager David Poile said yesterday. Nichol played in 59 games for the Predators last season, posting 13 points (7 goals and 6 assists) and 79 penalty minutes.
